title: Ticket #696: "Real" RPMs, with matching SRPMs
description:
We should ship "real" RPMs and ideally SRPMs so users can more easily get Condor. Our current RPMs is not as native as it should be, and we can't provide an SRPM at all at the moment. We may be able to use Red Hat's work directly or with some changes.

Users requesting RPMs:

  • admin 19542 - Wants SRPMs
creator: adesmet
